mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parameter_no AS "parameterNo", a.orders AS "orders", a.name AS "name", a.group_no AS "groupNo", a.merchant_no AS "merchantNo", a.parameter_group_id AS "parameterGroup.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN parameter_group b ON b.id = a.parameter_group_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_parameter( id, parameter_no, orders, name, group_no, merchant_no, parameter_group_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parameterNo}, #{orders}, #{name}, #{groupNo}, #{merchantNo}, #{parameterGroup.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product_parameter SET parameter_no = #{parameterNo}, orders = #{orders}, name = #{name}, group_no = #{groupNo}, merchant_no = #{merchantNo}, parameter_group_id = #{parameterGroup.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
